entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Epic: Rate Limiting in .NET 9 #53426
  • When using UseStaticFiles, AspNetCore does not call CreateReadStream to get a stream to return via http but rather uses the PhysicalPath to create it's own stream. #53425
  • Configuring Jwt Bearer Authority with simplified authentication configuration leads to degraded security #53423
  • `UseDirectoryBrowser` option for JSON responses #53421
  • Add Or Change Identity Claims In .Net 8 Blazor Web App #53420
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot #53419
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #53418
  • When Serialize using source generation the JsonOptions of the Source generator are ignored #53417
  • Using InputRadioGroup in a component does not generate a unique name #53413
  • ExtraQueryParams not sent when published #53409
  • Proposal for Bi-annual .NET releases (6-month cycle) #53407
  • To Be There More Easily Inject Why There Not #53403
  • Can we have a feature for deleting user claims when we delete users using the default identity in blazor .net 8? #53400

Closed

  • F5 doesn't compile child Razor Component Projects #53334
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #53280
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #53281
  • Perf regression: caching, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #53394
  • Support a better version of post/redirect/get #51674
    8.0.2
  • Add Blazor SSR css stylesheet link append-version component #49678
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Blazor] Make the fallback auto render mode timeout configurable #50250
    .NET 9 Planning
  • URL for "/_framework..." flashes briefly in browser address bar when using streaming rendering & enhanced form handling with redirects in Blazor #50822
    .NET 9 Planning
  • PageTitle doesn't display for SSR pages in mixed render mode app #50268
    .NET 9 Planning
  • SignalR prevents .NET8 app to stop if clients are connected #53165
    9.0-preview1
  • WebApplication.CreateBuilder(args) now ignores ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT in web.config if also specified in Environment Variables #53399
  • ASP.NET Core Blazor Authorization Roles do not allow non-word characters #53398
  • (BlazorServer) each navigation to external logs 2 errors a minute later #45267
    8.0.2
  • You must install .NET to run this application. #53328
    Discussions
  • How to cache static files in blazor .net 8 #53338
  • Default Tagless Container Component #53363
  • Error : Cannot read properties of null (reading 'removeChild')) #53372
  • Blazor: add support for beforetoggle event #53336

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Update karma.local.conf.js #53412
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Update karma.local.conf.js #53411
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update karma.local.conf.js #53410
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix closing SignalR Websocket connection on server close #53408
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Add 8.0 runs to helix matrix #53415
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Dispatch inbound activity handlers in Blazor Web apps #53313
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.2
  • Give perms to update-sdk.yml #53422
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Add automatic SDK updates #53414
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix instructions for update helix-matrix.yml #53416
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix closing SignalR Websocket connection on server close #53288
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] each navigation to external logs 2 errors a minute later #53297
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Blazor InputRadio is broken by IHandleEvent #53270
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.2
  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52973
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.27
  • [release/7.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52972
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0.16
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52971
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.2
  • Add title to column options. Fixes #52141 #53299
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.2
  • Stop duplicating history with streaming-enhanced-form PRG. Fixes #51674 #53301
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dddb219` to `7c07a86` #53323
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] Stop duplicating history with streaming-enhanced-form PRG. Fixes #51674 #53303
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Avoid fetching new page content when only the hash changes #53341
    area-blazor
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread (Net9) #52724
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 8 Planning
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Better implementation of EventCallback.Equals #53395
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Use cached ILogger instances to avoid repeated creation of these instances #53200
    area-mvc, community-contribution
